attributes.action: MAKE THE HONOURS SYSTEM MORE TRANSPARENT AND MORE OPEN AND ACCESSIBLE TO ORDINARY POEPLE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: THE HONOURS SYSTEM HAS BECOME A REWARD BASED SYSTEM TO THOSE PEOPLE WHO EITHER HAVE THE INFLUENCE OR THE MONEY TO BE HIGH PROFILE ENOUGH AS TO COME TO THE ATTENTION OF THOSE WISHING TO NOMINATE. THEREFORE ALL TO OFTEN ORDINARY PEOPLE ARE FORGOTTEN OR ARE PASSED OVER WITH SOME LESSER FORM OF AWARD A COMPLETE REWARD BASED SYSTEM FOR GOOD WORK OR DEED IS REQUIRED NOT SOLEY FOR POLITICAL PUPOSE

rejection.details: Please resubmit using upper and lower case. Using solely upper case makes the petition difficult to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
